programme.title: Cool Breeze
programme.desc: A paroled crook (Thalmus Rasulala) masterminds a $3 million jewelry theft to fund a bank for businessmen.

programme.title: Action Jackson
programme.desc: An Ivy League Detroit policeman (Carl Weathers) steals an auto tycoon's (Craig T. Nelson) mistress (Vanity) and stops his gang of assassins.

programme.title: Hurricane Smith
programme.desc: An American's (Carl Weathers) search for his sister leads to foul play and a brothel on the coast of Australia.

programme.title: Rage of the Dragon
programme.desc: Dragon battles the diabolical Tim Loon Kai, the master of the Snake Fist style of martial arts.

programme.title: Legacy of Rage
programme.desc: Sentenced to prison for a crime he did not commit, a man sets out for revenge after his release from jail.

programme.title: Blackstar Warrior
programme.desc: In a 1970s version of the future, a space detective searching for the truth about his real mother uncovers his adoptive parents' secret genetics lab and discovers it's controlled by a space nun cult bent on taking over the galaxy.

programme.title: Coming Soon to Soul Flix
programme.desc: "Coming To Soul Flix" features "Arena," "The Big Doll House," "Caged Heat," "Assault on Precinct 13," "The Bad Bunch" and others.

programme.title: Action Jackson
programme.desc: An Ivy League Detroit policeman (Carl Weathers) steals an auto tycoon's (Craig T. Nelson) mistress (Vanity) and stops his gang of assassins.

programme.title: Hitman
programme.desc: A fast talker (Eric Tsang) engages a Hong Kong rube (Jet Li) to track down the assassin of a sleazy Japanese businessman.

programme.title: The Jackie Robinson Story
programme.desc: After a successful baseball career in college and as a coach in the military, Jackie Robinson attracts the attention of Major League Baseball's Branch Rickey.

programme.title: The Joe Louis Story
programme.desc: A sportswriter (Paul Stewart) recalls the boxer's (Coley Wallace) career as world heavyweight champion.

programme.title: A Hero Ain't Nothin' But a Sandwich
programme.desc: A troubled boy becomes addicted to heroin, and his mother and foster father help him fight it.

programme.title: Melinda
programme.desc: An ex-girlfriend (Rosalind Cash) and a karate class help a disc jockey (Calvin Lockhart) avenge his slain girlfriend (Vonetta McGee).

programme.title: Hit Man
programme.desc: An avenger (Bernie Casey) wades through the Los Angeles porno underworld in the name of his dead brother.

programme.title: Black Samson
programme.desc: A nightclub owner (Rockne Tarkington) with a pet lion rids his neighborhood of a white mobster (William Smith).

programme.title: Black Eye
programme.desc: An ex-police officer operating a private detective business comes face to face with a syndicate-backed dope ring.
